channel.title: Great Idea
channel.description:
Why dont all the great coders and some ok coder team up to make somthing decent.
The current server right now are pathetic. I mean look at this [img]http://i37.tinypic.com/308abft.jpg[/img] [img]http://i445.photobucket.com/albums/qq177/hello-bye123/capture_01062009_120417.jpg[/img] [img]http://img522.imageshack.us/img522/6757/traininggu3.gif[/img] [img]http://img379.imageshack.us/img379/3539/dedi1uy6.jpg[/img]
3 Years and that's what we work with.
can we make something that can at least compare to rs. also this is why rs dose not sue us. we are like no threat to them.
post ur thought about that

item.title: Great Idea
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

I want to hit you in the face very hard. Mainly For Talking Like This. There’s no purpose.

Sue? The fuck? If they didn’t sue before, what makes you think they’d sue now?

Anyway, this is where I tried to get with the “perfect” RSPS. Make it a lot like RuneScape… Seems to me like you kind of stole the idea.

Read full topic

item.title: Great Idea
item.dc:creator: @sportpirate sportpirate
item.description:

Well I Dont Think Rs Cares If We Use 317 That Are Like 4 Years Old.
503+ Gets Jadex Pissed

item.title: Great Idea
item.dc:creator: @The_cook_from_runesc The cook from runescape
item.description:
@The_cook_from_runesc wrote:

Nobody’s really answered the question…

All clients are without doubt breaking the DMCA, but is it that clear with servers? I know if you think about it in simple terms, the actual servers should be legal but the developers are actually encouraging copyright theft and we’re using the runescape protocol.

Read full topic

item.title: Great Idea
item.dc:creator: @sportpirate sportpirate
item.description:
@sportpirate wrote:

They can take legal action against those who run a server with a cache of 508+, but only if the server owner refuses to co-operate with Jagex, by not taking down their server, and possibly their website, although a website should not be affected.

Its 503+ Because 503 Is When Gfx Update Happened.
Also Why Has Jadex Not Sue Pail Yet? His 523 Is Almost Like Rs.

We Would Need Moparisthebest To Organize That.
We Could Make Something If Some One Would Take Action.

Read full topic

item.title: Great Idea
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

The cook from runescape:

They aint gonna sue a development team… Then when the servers finished, they’ll have no chance at stopping the distribution. And besides, servers themselves are legal yes?

They can take legal action against those who run a server with a protocol of 503+, but only if the server owner refuses to co-operate with Jagex, by not taking down their server, and possibly their website, although a website should not be affected.

Projects have also been done like this in the past, and they all fail, this is due to the lack of communication, dedication and other aspects. Most people on the community these days are more interested in filling their server up with global objects and other useless features. You would need to write out a plan about the server before any work would begin on this, to see if people would be interested, that is my opinion.

Read full topic

item.title: Great Idea
item.dc:creator: @The_cook_from_runesc The cook from runescape
item.description:
@The_cook_from_runesc wrote:

I’m dedicated to things and I have no doubt about you, but people move on and don’t think twice about leaving their development team after a few months.

If you want, we could start a team but instead of posting a topic with an application process - we could PM good friends and smart programmers who would be interested in this.

Read full topic
